Package io.micronaut.http.client.jdk

Class DefaultJdkHttpClientRegistry

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.client.jdk.DefaultJdkHttpClientRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpClientRegistry<HttpClient>, AutoCloseable
@Factory @Order(2) @Internal public final class DefaultJdkHttpClientRegistry extends Object implements AutoCloseable, HttpClientRegistry<HttpClient>
Factory to create java.net.http.* HTTP Clients.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Sergio del Amo, Tim Yates
